base_description: Gray blender with a modern design.
part_description: Includes a square base, a transparent pitcher with lid, handle, and control panel with buttons. The pitcher is positioned on top of the base.
internal_interaction_description: The motor in the base powers the blades inside the pitcher when activated via the control panel. The lid prevents contents from spilling, and the handle allows for easy pouring.
external_interaction_description: Operates when plugged into an electrical outlet. Users interact with the control panel to select blending settings. Can blend ingredients like fruits and vegetables, creating smoothies or purees.
